autumn.lang.compiler

Class AutumnProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.lang.compiler.AutumnProject

  • public final class AutumnProject
extends java.lang.Object
    (Under Active Development) - An instance of this class represents an Autumn project.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutumnProject

        public AutumnProject(java.io.File project,
             IErrorReporter reporter)
        Sole Constructor.
        Parameters:
        project - is the directory that contains the Autumn-based project.
        reporter - is used to report compilation errors.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if project is null.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if reporter is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if project does not refer to a directory.

    • Method Detail

        public java.util.List<java.io.File> srcFiles()
        This method enumerates all the source-code files in the project.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed immutable list.

        Returns:

      • libFiles

        public java.util.List<java.io.File> libFiles()
        This method enumerates all the library jar-files in the project.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed immutable list.

      • compile

        public void compile()
             throws java.io.IOException
        This method compiles the project and outputs a jar-file.

        The name of the jar-file is always "program.jar". The jar-file will be placed in the root directory of the project.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String[] args)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        This method dynamically compiles and then runs a project.
        Parameters:
        args - are the command-line arguments to pass to the program.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the main module of the project cannot be found.
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the project does not contain a valid entry-point.
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the entry-point function throws an exception.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • test

        public TestResults test()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method dynamically compiles and then runs the unit-tests of a project.
        Returns:
        the results of running the unit-tests.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.
